description.info: There are several hotels in the vicinity of the Faculty; check any of them on booking.com or airbnb.com for prices/offers/reservations.
description.info2: Alternatively, a certain number of rooms will be available at The Academic Guest House of the University of Bucharest:

guest_house.title: Casa de Oaspeti Academica of University of Bucharest
guest_house.description: In order to stay at The Academic Guest House, you need to book a room through the organizers. For this purpose, please send an email to Cristian Cazacu (email: cristian.cazacu@fmi.unibuc.ro) (and cc: the contact person of the section you are attending) by the 1st of May 2019, specifying the date of your arrival/departure and if you want to book a single/double room.
